title: Video Editor
job_overview: We are looking for a full time video editor to join our ad agency. We run ads for HVAC owners across the USA. We are looking for someone who can create high quality ads for our customers. We are looking for someone with a strong work ethic, are eager to learn, and want to grow with the company. We are looking for someone who has experience with Ai as we want to integrate more into our company to help create more high quality videos at a fast pace.
